{{dcl|num=3|since=c++20|
template&lt; class S2 &gt;
    requires std::convertible_to&lt;const S2&amp;, S&gt;
        constexpr move_sentinel( const std::move_sentinel&lt;S2&gt;&amp; other );
}}

Constructs a new sentinel adaptor.

@1@ Default constructor. The underlying sentinel is value-initialized.

@2@ The underlying sentinel is initialized with {{c|x}}.

@3@ The underlying sentinel is initialized with that of {{c|other}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|x|sentinel to adapt}}
{{par|other|sentinel adaptor to copy}}
{{par end}}
